title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Metis is a PoS (Poof-of-Stake) scaling solution of Ethereum laying on top of rollup mechanism.This layer 2 network differentiates itself from others with the Metis Virtual Machine, which is a hardfork of Optimistic Virtual Machine.Its structure can handle up to 2,000 TPS (Transactions Per Second) at the current stage.Recently, Metis has introduced the concept of Decentralized Autonomous Company (DAC), which operates similarly to the popular Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO), but focusing on efficient collaboration between people and businesses.Learn more about Metis Chain, its Mainnet RPC and Testnet RPC in our article What is Metis RPC
